scenario_text.value: You ready, Falcomon? Let’s push forward!

Leave it to me!
You won’t escape this time, Garurumon!

Urgh... Why? Why would you help these
weaklings?

I might be weak now, but I’m definitely
getting stronger!

Minoru is always pushing himself to move on,
to be stronger. I would see him succeed!

He may be weak, but he sees that and has the
willpower to keep going anyway.

I know I’ll get stronger.
And I’ll protect Falcomon this time!

Minoru’s strength lies not in his muscles,
but in his heart. Our bond sustains him!
Falcomon!
You ready, Diatrymon? Let’s push forward!

Leave it to me! You won’t escape this time,
Garurumon!

Urgh.. Why? Why would you help these
weaklings?

I may be weak for now... But I’m getting
stronger all the time!

Minoru recognizes his weaknesses and seeks to
surpass them. I believe in his resolve!

Minoru may be weak, but he acknowledges his
shortcomings and can soldier on all the same!

I made up my mind to get stronger. That way
I can protect Diatrymon, too!

Minoru’s strength lies not in his muscles,
but in his heart. In our bond!
Diatrymon...!
You ready, Yatagaramon? Let’s push forward!

Leave it to me! You won’t escape this time,
Garurumon!

Urgh.. Why? Why would you help these
weaklings?

I may be weak for now... But I’m getting
stronger all the time!

The power to recognize weakness and fly on.
Minoru has what it takes to grow stronger!

Minoru may be weak, but he acknowledges his
shortcomings, and has the strength to soar!

I made up my mind to get stronger. That way
I can protect Yatagaramon, too!

Minoru’s strength lies in his heart! In our
bond!
Yatagaramon...!

You jest! Weakness is unforgivable! How dare
you insects think you might ever be strong?!
